The data was obtained from EPA's LandView CDs.</abstract><purpose>This digital, geographically referenced data set was developed by the Iowa Department of Natural Resources to carry out agency responsibilities related to management, protection, and development of Iowa's natural resources.</purpose><supplinf>All attribute data for the facilities is from EPA's database and has not been quality checked.
